WhalesniperÂ¶

Get Whalesniper signals.

GET /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>

PARAMETERS:

PARAMETER

TYPE

MANDATORY

market

String

NO

StartDate

INT

NO

EndDate

INT

NO

Amount

Float

NO

Pair

String

NO

Coin

String

NO

Exchange

String

NO

Trend

String

NO

market: Query WhaleSniper signals for a specific market /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&market=<MARKET>. THE ACCEPTED MARKET FORMAT IS COINPAIR: SO BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT, BNBUSDT and so on

StartDate: Get all the signals after a specif timestamp, an integer unix timestamp must be provided. /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&StartDate=<MARKET>.

EndDate: Get all the signals before a specif timestamp, an integer unix timestamp must be provided. /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&EndDate=<MARKET>.

Amount: Get all the signals where the amount is bigger than the provided amount. Must be a float /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&amount=<MARKET>.

Pair: Get all the signals for a specific pair /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&pair=<MARKET>.

Coin: Get all the signals for a specific coin across all the possible pairs /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&coin=<MARKET>.

Exchange: Get all the signals from a specific exchange. Available exchanges: Binance, Bitmex, Binance Futures, Bittrex, Huobi. /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&exchange=<MARKET>.

Trend: Get all the signals with a specific direction: trend or bull. /v1/whalesniper/?key=<YOUR_KEY>&trend=<bear/bull>.
